commands.name: d
commands.description:
Smart Roll command 
 Usage: d[number of faces] [+/-] [modifier] 
 Performs a roll using DragonScale rules. Adding the modifier is optional.

commands.name: roll
commands.description:
Dice Roll command 
 Usage: roll [number of dice][k/d][number of faces] [+/-] [modifier]... 
 Performs regular roll. You can add any number of dice and modifiers.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description:
Prefix change command. 
 Usage: prefix [new prefix] 
 Changes bot's prefix.

commands.name: help
commands.description:
Help command. 
 Usage: help [command name] 
 Shows description of given command.
